entities.name: minos
entities.description: Minos is described as coming out of the sky in the late afternoon before the funeral.

entities.name: forest
entities.description: The Forest is mentioned as being near where Minos landed.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is watching from a window and avoiding contact with Ministry officials.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is waiting to receive the woman who has just arrived.

entities.name: minister for magic
entities.description: The Minister for Magic is part of a delegation of Ministry officials.

relationships.description: Hagrid receives the woman who has just arrived.
The Ministry officials, including the Minister for Magic, are being accommodated within the castle.
